issue.title: Temporary fix for #1256  Open multiple metadata edition forms can mess session data and result in data inconsistency
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

See #1256, this is a temporary fix, to lock metadata edition to avoid collisions with multiple metadata edited simultaneously.

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

This on can be close, it has been merged (rev. 9476)
